constraints.name: non_overlapping_subsegments
constraints.description: 两个子段不重叠（即一个子段不能完全包含另一个子段）

constraints.name: distinct_elements_in_subsegments
constraints.description: 两个子段中的元素在各自子段内是唯一的，且两个子段之间没有重复的元素
constraints.formal: A[l1:r1] ∩ A[l2:r2] = ∅ 且 |distinct(A[l1:r1])| = r1 - l1 + 1 且 |distinct(A[l2:r2])| = r2 - l2 + 1
